Мастер фраза для определения максимально: Well, that old thing almost tore me to pieces for its g
dialogs_chapter_3_Ты!.. \\!Снова драки х: You!.. \!Do you want a fight again?!..
dialogs_chapter_3_Я не сражаться сюда пр: I didn't come here to fight.
dialogs_chapter_3_Нам с тобой предстоит: You and I have a long... a very long journey ahead of us.
dialogs_chapter_3_Мои кости смешались с: My bones are mixed with organs\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_3_Как ты себе это предст:
How do you imagine it?! \!
*Coughs blood*
dialogs_chapter_3_Не беда, сейчас помогу: No problem, I’ll help you now\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_3_Риом почувствовал, как:
Riom felt the darkness dig into his ribs.\.
It quickly spread throughout the body.
dialogs_chapter_3_Мог бы и помягче исцел: I could have healed it more gently!
dialogs_chapter_3_Не вредничай. Ты жив и: Do not be mean. You are alive and can move.
dialogs_chapter_3_Кто ты и зачем напал н:
Who are you and why did you attack me at the punitive 
headquarters?
dialogs_chapter_3_Меня зовут Коельтан, я: My name is Koeltan, I am your partner.
And about the attack\..\..\.. It was a test.\!
I’ll explain the details in a calmer environment.
Even the walkie-talkie is crashed to pieces.
dialogs_chapter_3_Незачем по пустякам бе:
There’s no need to bother the higher reapers over trifles! \!
That creepy punisher made it clear what needs to be
done. \.Kill the Risen. \.Everyone.
dialogs_chapter_3_Черт\\..\\..\\.. Я слы:
Crap\..\..\..
I hear your voice in my head\..\..\..
Is this n-normal?\..\..
dialogs_chapter_3_Пора в путь! Я буду по:
It's time to go!
I will help as much as possible, and you move on
to the goal\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_3_Прости, тебе уже не к: Sorry, you don't need this anymore\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_3_Это мне тоже пригодитс: This will be useful to me too.
dialogs_chapter_3_Теперь нужно найти без: Now we need to find a safe place.
dialogs_chapter_3_Только сам механизм в: Only the mechanism itself is in sleep mode.
dialogs_chapter_3_Направь немного энерги:
Put some energy into the core.
A slight impulse will bring the machine to life.
dialogs_chapter_3_Нужно найти новую, или: I need to find a new one, or make one myself.
dialogs_chapter_3_И меня как раз есть че: And I just have a drawing of a battery.
dialogs_chapter_3_Ну хоть напоследок нам: Well, at least he finally helped us\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_3_Что за предчувствие? Т:
What kind of premonition?
Did you spot someone near Tini?
Yes, but just for a moment\..\..\..
Not sure if it's a devastator\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_3_Кто ещё кроме жнецов и:
Who else but the reapers and devastators can
walk around the canyon?
dialogs_chapter_3_Много кто.\\. Каньон -:
Many people.\. The canyon is a favorite place for those
who hide from the eyes of Supreme Beings, like
God, the Devil and your creator -\. Death.
dialogs_chapter_3_Так что\\..\\..\\.. Ес:
So\..\..\.. If you care about the fate of
that little reaper is worth returning to camp.
But remember, the power of Genom Morkret
is not limitless.
dialogs_chapter_3_Если столкнешься с чем:
If you run into something\..\..\.. or someone that
doesn't look like the local inhabitants, you better run. \.
Your survival is in our common interests.
dialogs_chapter_3_А рецепт изготовления: Do you know the recipe for making it?
dialogs_chapter_3_Думаю, у кого-то из по:
I think one of the dead people has a spare
battery, or a drawing of it.
dialogs_chapter_3_Нужно раздобыть батаре: I need to get a battery.
dialogs_chapter_3_ВАША СМЕРТЬ СТАНЕТ РАС: YOUR DEATH WILL BE THE DAWN OF OUR RACE!
dialogs_chapter_3_Первым ударом гигант Л: With his first blow, the giant Linker crushed the engineer's legs into dust\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_3_Вторым ударом - распол: With the second blow, he split the body into two.
dialogs_chapter_3_1 заряд слитка жизни и: 1 charge of a life bar and you'll be as good as new\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_3_Тини что-то крепко сжа: Tini clutched something tightly in his left hand.
dialogs_chapter_3_Он медленно поднял рук: He slowly raised his hand and placed it on Riom's torso.
dialogs_chapter_3_После этого свет жизни: After this, the light of life in the eyes of the wounded reaper went out.
dialogs_chapter_3_Для начала выберемся и:
First, let's get out of the environment of the devastators. \|
Then we'll find a way to contact the High Reapers. \.\.
One of them will tell you what to do next.
dialogs_chapter_3_А как с Восставшими бу: How will you fight the Risen?
dialogs_chapter_3_Как раз для этого мне: This is precisely why I need the advice of the Werolomgers.
dialogs_chapter_3_Тини достал слиток жиз: Tini took out an ingot of life.
dialogs_chapter_3_Спасибо, что помог выб:
Thank you for helping me get out\..\..\..
Without you, I would have been killed sooner or later.
dialogs_chapter_3_Расскажи штабу Веролом:
Tell the Werolomger headquarters everything
you saw and tell them that I am alive and
I need help.
dialogs_chapter_3_Каньон со всех сторон:
The canyon is infested with devastators on all sides.
and I have no idea where to look for the Risen.
dialogs_chapter_3_Как только я буду в бе:
As soon as I'm in the safe zone -
I can get in touch.
dialogs_chapter_3_Хорошо, я передам. И е: Ok I'll pass it on. And also take this\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_3_Эмм\\..\\..\\.. И как: Um\..\..\.. And how will it help me?
dialogs_chapter_3_С помощью этой установ:
With this installation you can demolish
large obstacles, set traps and much more\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_3_Уверен, ты найдешь ей: I'm sure you'll find a good use for it!
dialogs_chapter_3_ТВОЯ СМЕРТЬ СТАНЕТ РАС: YOUR DEATH WILL BE THE DAWN OF OUR RACE!
dialogs_chapter_3_Риом, заткни его побыс: Riom, shut him up quickly! \.It's too noisy.
dialogs_chapter_3_Согласен\\..\\..\\.. А: I agree\..\..\.. My ears are already ringing.
dialogs_chapter_3_Риом, насчёт ресурсов\:
Riom, about resources\..\..\.. To create a battery it is very
Need a hydrite shard. Hydrite deposits often germinate
to the surface. Most often they can be found in the desert or\..\..\..
in the underground sections of the canyon.
dialogs_chapter_3_Где-то поблизости есть:
Is there a cave somewhere nearby or some kind of descent
underground?
dialogs_chapter_3_Есть целая секция пеще: There is a whole section of caves, but it is very far from here\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_3_В-вспомнил! Опустошите:
I r-remember! Devastators often attack from ambushes\..\..\..
These creatures love to hide under f-fragile earth
rocks, waiting for prey.
dialogs_chapter_3_Да!\\.\\. Любая трещин:
Yes!\.\. Any crack under your feet and in the walls can
lead us to the dungeon.
dialogs_chapter_3_(Лучше поискать другое: (Better look for another solution. I hate dungeons\..\..\..)
dialogs_chapter_3_И так\\..\\..\\.. Судя:
And so\..\..\.. Judging by the drawing, we need 4 pieces
histite and 1 hydrite shard.
dialogs_chapter_3_Залежи гистита можно л: Deposits of histite can be easily found on the surface.
dialogs_chapter_3_А вот с гидритом будет: But with hydrite it will be more difficult.
dialogs_chapter_3_Есть идея. \\.Почини р:
I have an idea. \.
Repair the radio in the creator and contact
someone from Purgatory.
dialogs_chapter_3_Спроси, где именно иск:
Ask where exactly to look for hydrite deposits
in the canyon.
dialogs_chapter_3_Я могу улавливать маги:
I can pick up magical waves.
Hydrite should be emitting them.
dialogs_chapter_3_Пройдись по округе, а:
Walk around and I'll tell you where it comes from.
signal.
It turns out\..\..\.. Are you some kind of radar?
dialogs_chapter_3_Я дам знать, как будеш:
I'll let you know when you're close to something
interesting.
dialogs_chapter_3_Вряд ли\\..\\..\\.. О-:
Unlikely\..\..\.. The d-devastators damaged all
equipment.
dialogs_chapter_3_К счастью обменник бол: Fortunately, the exchanger is more or less intact.
dialogs_chapter_3_Нужна только батарейку: We just need to change the battery.
dialogs_chapter_3_Без энергии этот обмен:
Without energy, this exchanger is useless.
We need to get a battery.
dialogs_chapter_3_Ухх\\..\\..\\.. Я чуть: Uhh\..\..\.. I almost broke my legs!!
dialogs_chapter_3_Ха-ха-ха! \\!За то ты: Ha ha ha! \!That's why you used my sword for the first time!
dialogs_chapter_3_Ну, чтобы обидно не бы:
Well, so as not to be offensive\..\..\.. so be it,
You can use Shadow Strike permanently.
dialogs_chapter_3_Легкий магический импу:
A light magical impulse that breaks any
obstacles.
dialogs_chapter_3_Органические тоже. Чем:
Organic too.
The lower the target's magical defense, the more painful it is.
damage.
dialogs_chapter_3_В разделе \"Магия\" по: A new skill, “Shadow Strike,” has appeared in the “Magic” section.
dialogs_chapter_3_: *Tini closed the eyes of the fallen reaper*
dialogs_chapter_3_З-здесь всё и началось: T-this is where it all started.
dialogs_chapter_3_Всё что от нас требова:
All that was required of us was to c-carefully extract
resources.
dialogs_chapter_3_А к-как только Крейг п:
And a-as soon as Craig received the o-order to return
immediately\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_3_И проломов стены\\..\\:
And the breaches of the wall\..\..\.. a huge\..\..\.. multi-armed creature\..\..\..
i-instantly tore three of us apart.
dialogs_chapter_3_Я сбежал.\\.\\. Прятал: I escaped.\.\. I hid and waited for my squad.
dialogs_chapter_3_Не вини себя. Самобиче:
Do not blame yourself. Self-flagellation for fallen 
friends will not help.
dialogs_chapter_3_Лучшее, что ты можешь:
The best thing you can do is remember them and
not repeat the same mistakes.
dialogs_chapter_3_Не п-повторять ошибок\:
Don't r-repeat mistakes\..\..\..
What do you mean?
dialogs_chapter_3_В следующий раз не тру: Next time, don’t be a coward and go headlong into the attack?
dialogs_chapter_3_Перед тем, как лезть в:
Before venturing into an unknown area, conduct
intelligence.
dialogs_chapter_3_Прислушиваться к инсти:
Listen to your instincts and the voice of reason.\.\.
We all make mistakes.\.\.
If you learn your lesson, you will save dozens of reapers
from death.
dialogs_chapter_3_Кстати о здравом смысл:
Speaking of common sense.\.\!
It's time to get out!
dialogs_chapter_3_Поторопись со сбором г: Hurry up and collect the hydrite.
dialogs_chapter_3_Опустошители учуяли те:
The devastators have smelled you and are coming
right here.
dialogs_chapter_3_Нам о-отдали приказ об:
We were g-given the order to set up an outpost and a 
couple of mining points\..\..\..near the caves.
dialogs_chapter_3_В них полно самых разн:
They are full of a wide variety of r-resources, 
enough for a full strengthening of Purgatory\..\..\.. Heh.
dialogs_chapter_3_Мы не трогали местных:
We did not touch the local inhabitants, we even 
avoided wild devastators\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_3_Но в один м-момент свя:
But at one m-moment, communication with other 
s-squads broke off.
The devastators went crazy and s-started killing all 
the reapers.
There's no one left\..\..\..
How much time has passed\..\..\..
D-day?\.\. A week?
dialogs_chapter_3_\\C[1]Как тебе удалось: \C[1]How did you manage to hold out for so long?
dialogs_chapter_3_Как тебе удалось так д: How did you manage to last so long?
I was hiding\..\..\..
And there's a ton of hydrite deposits underground.
dialogs_chapter_3_О-опустошители не таки:
D-devastators aren't that aggressive\..\..\..
if you don't provoke them.
dialogs_chapter_3_Ты пробовал связаться: Have you tried contacting your Headquarters?
dialogs_chapter_3_Д-да\\..\\..\\.. Мне п:
Y-yes\..\..\..
I was ordered to retreat to the nearest teleport.
dialogs_chapter_3_Но я не смог\\..\\..\\:
But I couldn't\..\..\..
There were too many devastators.
dialogs_chapter_3_И ещё\\..\\..\\.. С ни:
And further\..\..\..
With them was some giant thug with horns and
with a huge axe!
dialogs_chapter_3_Он сейчас сторожит тел: He is now guarding the teleport.
dialogs_chapter_3_Идём со мной, попробуе:
Come with me, let’s try to get out.\.
I'm sure the teleport is somewhere nearby.
dialogs_chapter_3_Притормози, Риом!\\. М:
Slow down, Riom!\.
This sissy thing is annoying me.
dialogs_chapter_3_Он весь дрожит, заикае:
He's shaking all over, stuttering\..\..\.. and even his
The story is not convincing.
dialogs_chapter_3_За все свое человеческ:
Throughout my entire human existence, I have 
often I saw a similar picture.
dialogs_chapter_3_Когда с виду запуганны:
When a seemingly frightened, helpless boy
turned out to be that\..\..\.. serial killer.
dialogs_chapter_3_Я бы на твоем месте ем: I wouldn't trust him if I were you.
(Come on\..\..\.. Maniacs among the reapers?
For thousands of years of existence of 
Purgatory, not a single case has been 
documented!)
dialogs_chapter_3_(Ни в одном корпусе, д: (Not in any building, even among the punishers\..\..\..)
Leave the engineer here.\.
Let him tell you how to activate the teleport, and with 
the rest you'll figure it out yourself.
dialogs_chapter_3_Что если на него напад: What if he's attacked by devastators?
dialogs_chapter_3_Уверен..\\..\\.. Когда:
I'm sure..\..\.. When Tini hides and you start
a massacre - these creatures will have no time for him.
dialogs_chapter_3_Если его не повредили:
If it hasn't been damaged by the devastators, it's 
enough to replace the battery.
dialogs_chapter_3_Пошли, поможешь найти: Come on, help me find the battery.
dialogs_chapter_3_Как активирую телепорт: I'll let you know when I activate the teleport.
dialogs_chapter_3_Хорошо\\..\\..\\.. Ещё:
Fine\..\..\..
Also, just in case, k-keep the drawing of the battery.
dialogs_chapter_3_Как разберёшься с меха:
Once you figure out the mechanism, contact me on 
the radio.
By the way,\..\..\..
After the fall, my radio broke.
dialogs_chapter_3_Не проблема.\\. Её мож:
No problem.\.
It can be easily repaired with the help of the creator.
dialogs_chapter_3_Но ведь\\..\\..\\.. ка: But\..\..\.. the canyon is teeming with devastators\..\..\..
I will take care of them.\. If they attack.
dialogs_chapter_3_Чёрт\\..\\..\\.. Ты же:
Damn\..\..\.. You are a reaper, a servant of Death.
Why do you have so much fear?!
dialogs_chapter_3_Не знаю.\\. Я меч толь:
Don't know.\.
I only used the sword in c-classes\..\..\..
And I hardly fought.
dialogs_chapter_3_Д-другое дело - устрой:
A-another matter is devices and mechanisms,
I'm good at them.
dialogs_chapter_3_Ладно\\..\\..\\.. пока:
Okay\..\..\.. show me where resources can be 
collected here. If someone attacks, help in any way 
you can, but don’t force yourself.
dialogs_chapter_3_Хоть бы ты не ошибся,: I hope you're not mistaken, Riom\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_3_Если Тини сделает что-: If Tini does something I don't like\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_3_(Все будет хорошо\\..\:
(Everything will be fine\..\..\.. He's normal.
But if you notice anything, it’s better to warn
and then I’ll figure out what to do myself.)
dialogs_chapter_3_Ты крикни, чтобы на ве:
Shout so that the whole canyon can hear.\!
Maybe Tini will respond.
Maybe he hid somewhere\..\..\..
There's no time for that now! \|
Collect the battery and run to the teleporter. \
dialogs_chapter_3_Восставшие сами себя н: The Risens will not destroy themselves!
dialogs_chapter_3_Тини, мне нужно погово:
Tini, I need to talk to the spirit of Genome
Morkret. Please wait here for me.
dialogs_chapter_3_Д-да... Я подожду тебя: Y-yes... I'll wait for you at the camp.
